hooks.name: update-claude-on-feature
hooks.description: Remind to update CLAUDE.md when adding features
hooks.matcher: tool == "Write" && (tool_input.file_path matches "components/" || tool_input.file_path matches "services/" || tool_input.file_path matches "hooks/")

hooks.command: echo '[Hook] Remember to update CLAUDE.md if this is a new feature or significant change'

hooks.name: lint-on-save
hooks.description: Run lint check after editing TypeScript files

hooks.name: warn-console-log
hooks.description: Warn about console.log in production code

hooks.command: grep -n 'console.log' "$TOOL_INPUT_FILE_PATH" && echo '[Warning] Remove console.log before committing' || true
grep -n ': any' "$TOOL_INPUT_FILE_PATH" && echo '[Warning] Avoid using any type' || true
